snippet: New data shows Jardiance cuts the risk of heart attack and strokes that are the top killers of diabetes patients.
abstract: Study conducted by Eli Lilly and Boehringer Ingelheim, manufacturers of  drug Jardiance, finds drug reduces risk of heart attacks and strokes that are number one killer of diabetes patients.
lead_paragraph: New data shows Jardiance cuts the risk of heart attack and strokes that are the top killers of diabetes patients.

headline.main: Study Finds Drug Lowers Risk of Diabetes Complications
headline.print_headline: Study Finds Drug Lowers Risk of Diabetes Complications
